CustomField.description: Used to display correct annual storage fee in stem cell storage agreement.
CustomField.formula: if ( Cord_Blood_Order__r.Annual_Fee_Unit_Price__c = 150, "1 Product, $150; 2 Products, $275; 3 Products $375.", "1 Product, $"& Text(Cord_Blood_Order__r.Annual_Fee_Unit_Price__c) &" ; 2 Products, $" &Text(Cord_Blood_Order__r.Annual_Fee_Unit_Price__c*2) & " ; 3 Products $" & Text(Cord_Blood_Order__r.Annual_Fee_Unit_Price__c*3)&".")
CustomField.label: Annual Price for Stem Cell Agreement
